Package de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.worker

Long running background tasks for I/O, database or any other computational intensive task are separated from the EDT.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ArtefactUpdater Updates the artefacts data structure of any artefact in a separate thread, disburden the EDT from being blocked during that work.
DeleteArtefactWorker The process of deleting an artefact is done in a background thread, to avoid annoying blocking of the EDT.
FacetUpdater The job of this background task is to fetch all factes belonging to an artefact.
GenerateTestData This class has the job of generating test data to the artefacts and their facets.
LoadEMFModel ModelLoadWorker class for doing the main tasks separated from the EDT.
LoadMultiplicityValues The system gives the user the opportunity to select those values having multiple values in a dialog.
LoadNullValueWorker Loading all facets of available artefact elements is done in background.
LoadValueFile  
LogWorker When the application has been shipped and exceptions or errors occurring an mechanism to log these events is helpful.
ProbabilityDensityFunctionUpdater This class updates the probability density function chart each time either the distribution has changed or the values have changed.
ProgressListener ProgressListener class is used to give a feedback to users, which have invoked long running processes in background.
SaveValueFile Writes a typed in list for a given attribute as a file into the file system.
SetMultiplicityValues The job of this class is to save, for selected facets, the changed multiplicity value.
SetNullValuesWorker The job of this class is to save changed settings in facet's null values.
UpdateQuantity This background worker has the job of updating the quantity in the corresponding artefact, when the user types in an amount in the text field.
UpdateUnit This worker has the job of updating the Unit tree component.
UpdateUnitCustom This worker has the job of updating the Unit tree component.
XMLUpdater To reflect the user interactions with the system data structure and its serialized data we update that synchronized.
 

Package de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.worker Description

Long running background tasks for I/O, database or any other computational intensive task are separated from the EDT.
